CustomField.formula: IF($Permission.Talabat_Partner_service_Knowledge, "Talabat - Partner service",NULL)+ IF($Permission.Talabat_Back_office_Knowledge, "Talabat - Back office",NULL)+ IF($Permission.Talabat_Live_chat_Knowledge, "Talabat - Live chat",NULL)+ IF($Permission.APAC_Bengali_Knowledge,"APAC - Bengali",NULL) + IF($Permission.APAC_Burmese_Knowledge,"APAC - Burmese",NULL) + IF($Permission.APAC_Cantonese_Knowledge,"APAC - Cantonese",NULL) + IF($Permission.APAC_English_Knowledge,"APAC - English",NULL) + IF($Permission.APAC_Khmer_Knowledge,"APAC - Khmer",NULL) + IF($Permission.APAC_Lao_Knowledge,"APAC - Lao",NULL) + IF($Permission.APAC_Mandarin_Knowledge,"APAC - Mandarin",NULL) + IF($Permission.APAC_Thai_Knowledge,"APAC - Thai",NULL) + IF($Permission.APAC_Urdu_Knowledge,"APAC - Urdu",NULL) + IF($Permission.PedidosYa_Spanish_Knowledge,"PedidosYa - Spanish",NULL)
CustomField.label: Knowledge Department Formula
